headline: Taking Stock of Fortive (FTV)’s Valuation After Its Better‑Than‑Expected Q3 Results
summary: Fortive (FTV) just turned in a third quarter that topped Wall Street on both revenue and profitability, and the stock has climbed about 8% since the earnings release as investors reassess the setup. See our latest analysis for Fortive. That post earnings bounce fits into a mixed picture, with a 30 day share price return of 5.56% and a 90 day gain of 12.99%, but a year to date share price decline of 28.58% and a one year total shareholder return of 9.82% in the red, suggesting momentum is...
